entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
